markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 14"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Tangled Forest Rake](/Feats.aspx?ID=475) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Monk" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=112" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 164 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[Tangled Forest Stance](/Feats.aspx?ID=461)

**Requirements**
You are in Tangled Forest Stance.

</column>

---

You reposition foes with raking attacks. Make a lashing branch Strike. If you hit and deal damage, you force the target to move 5 feet into a space within your reach. This follows the [forced movement](/Rules.aspx?ID=451) rules.
name: Tangled Forest Rake
requirement: You are in Tangled Forest Stance.
requirement_markdown: You are in Tangled Forest Stance.
